rows.label: qev080403_MSG0001
rows.name:
This Avi girl's been buying weapons in bulk lately.
And I'm happy for the business and all, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, it seems her boss is a real penny-pincher,
because she haggles like her life depends on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0003
rows.name:
And I'm a blue-collar guy myself, so I can sympathize.
I've seen my share of stingy managers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0004
rows.name:
Anyway, I'd like to cut her a break, but the prices she's
asking for would put me out of business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0005
rows.name:
...What got into her? We finally strike a deal,
and then she bolts like a frightened rabbit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0006
rows.name:
Is she really that busy? Plus, it seems like her boss
scrimped even harder than usual on the funds for this
latest order of weapons...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0007
rows.name:
Honestly, I feel bad for her. Whoever she's working for,
they're bleeding her dry. It's pure exploitation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev080403_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Fritz where Avi's shipment is being delivered.

rows.label: qev080403_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev080403_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Fritz about his relationship to Lyvia.

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0008
rows.name:
Let's see... Looks like she wants them all
brought out to Rooney Cavern in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now, she's become a regular lately, and I don't make
a habit of prying...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0010
rows.name:
but what in the world do you suppose they're doing
in a place like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0011
rows.name:
You think maybe they're planning to get a bunch of
BLADEs out there for a mass hunting mission or
something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0012
rows.name:
Lately she's been buying up my weapons in bulk,
so I guess you'd call her a regular.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0013
rows.name:
She's certainly passionate about her work.
I guess she's a nice-enough gal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0014
rows.name:
It's just... Well, her boss seems like a real hardcase.
Always on the poor girl's case about being slow,
even when she's clearly working her tail off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'd hate for her to get in trouble on my account,
so I'll try to put the order together in a hurry and
rush it out to Rooney Cavern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0016
rows.name:
I suppose they've got a branch office out there.
Or maybe there's a BLADE camp or something...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0017
rows.name:
I've got to get that order together and deliver the
weapons to Avi's office out in Rooney Cavern.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080403_MSG0018
rows.name:
Better get it done before that crabby boss of hers
pitches another fit...[ST:wait ]
